name: Nightscapes
description:
Welcome to the world of Nightscapes, a dangerous realm filled with monsters, dark magic, and evil! Pick up your weapon and invite your friends to help restore order to this chaotic plane by vanquishing your foes, completing quests, and building your characters along the way! 

Nightscapes is currently in early development and is a pet project of mine. Progress is slow, but I enjoy working on it, and love to talk about it. So, it may prove to be slightly buggy, but you'll still have a blast playing. I hope you'll join our active Discord to share in the community, and provide any feedback you have to help shape the future of Nightscapes!

Still not convinced? Well, let me tell you, there are some pretty awesome (and also some pretty standard) features in Nightscapes, including

  • Item Generation: An endless supply of randomly generated gear to aid you in your travels!
  • Monster Bestiary: Want to know more about a baddie? or just bored? Kill enough of them and you can unlock useful stats and bonuses about them!
  • Smart Monsters: Not all of them have many brains, but they do have skills such as healing, and spawning reinforcements to come to their aid!
  • Epic Quests: Help the locals do super exciting things like picking flowers, cleaning up skulls in the graveyard, and stepping on slimes!
  • A Likely Over-Complicated Stat System: Because, reasons!
